name: Washable Area Rugs - Perfect for Living Room, Bedroom, Kids Room, Nursery - Stain & Water Resistant Non-Slip, Pet & Child Friendly, Vintage Tribal Area Rugs (Green, 5' x 7')
short_description: All-in-One Non-Slip & Washable Area Rug: Tired of dealing with separate rug covers and pads? Our innovative foldable area rug combines both features into one convenient piece. Designed with a low pile and exceptional non-slip backing, it stays securely in place, even in high-traffic areas. Plus, it can be easily cleaned in your home washing machine. Durable and Stylish for High-Traffic Areas: Our machine-woven area rug not only offers a soft and plush feel, but also boasts exceptional durability. Its low pile design makes it ideal for high-traffic areas like living rooms and dining rooms. The vintage-inspired design is digitally printed, ensuring a level of detail that cannot be achieved by hand. Indulge in Luxurious Softness: Sink your feet into our washable rug and experience the ultimate in softness. Its velvety surface feels incredible to the touch, and it rolls out smoothly on your floor, without any creases or bends. Enjoy comfort and elegance in one stunning package. Timeless Elegance for Your Home: Enhance the beauty of your living spaces with a touch of vintage charm. Our washable area rug features an ornate central medallion and a distinctive border, tinted in warm tones of browns, honey beige, and creams. The intentional distressing adds to its rustic home decor theme, offering a timeless and sophisticated look. Easy Maintenance for Long-Lasting Beauty: Keeping your area rugs clean is a breeze. Simply vacuum them regularly to remove dirt and debris. And when it's time for a deeper clean, our rug is machine washable. Use mild detergent, avoid bleach or fabric softener, and either machine dry it or air dry it without heat. With proper care, your rug will maintain its beauty for years to come.
